trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that defines an action to be executed if the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition"></xref> evaluates to `true`, for <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions"></xref>, or `false`, for <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions"></xref>.
This class must be inherited.

<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objects (which can be used as both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.

<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> is the base type that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> classes derive from.
The uses of these classes is as follows:
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> class.
Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> instance.
The runtime state that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is executing in.
Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that was used previously in a call to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)"></xref>.
A collection of strings that represent the names of fields and properties that are changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
`true` to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> validated correctly and has no errors; otherwise, `false`.
